name: Mailchimp
description: Download email marketing data from Mailchimp.
instructions:
1. Navigate to the API keys section of your account
  2. Click the 'Create a Key' button to create a new API key for Bytespree
  3. Update the label value for the newly created key to 'Bytespree'
  4. Look at the address bar in your browser and note the first section of the URL - this is your 'Data Center' (ex: 'us14')
